name: WhatCanYouDo?
description:
Hello everybody. 

This is my first adequate project, and in general the first one, which I strive to complete to the end. And yes, it has a bunch of bugs, jambs and other things ... I know, accept it.

This is another generated "Doodle Jump" style platformer.

The background, the character and the bird are not mine, taken from free assets. Thank them for this beauty.

Any comments would be welcome.

Thanks to all.
